title: Update footer copyright name to Sanjay singh Chauhan

requirements.text:
Update ONLY the footer bottom-bar copyright

element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[1] so the displayed name becomes "Sanjay singh Chauhan", while keeping the dynamic current year and all other footer content unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer bottom bar copyright line displays: "Â© <currentYear> Sanjay singh Chauhan. All rights reserved." with <currentYear> remaining dynamic (derived from the current date).
No other footer text, links (including the caffeine.ai link), layout, or styling is changed.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[1].
Keep the year value dynamic (do not hardcode the year).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths.
nonGoals: Do not change listing agent contact details or any other footer sections.
Do not add new sections (e.g., bio) or new pages as part of this change.
Do not introduce backend changes or persistence for this update.
